jump_scares.spoiler: Taylor shines the flashlight on a corpse with a screaming sound cue
Robbie moves away from the mirror to reveal several corpses watching them on the other side
Steve sits down on an armchair, and is flung forward with a sudden burst of lightning
There is a sudden screech that startles Diane and Steven, and the monster stomps its foot down as they turn around
Diane opens the closet and several corpses jump out at her
A light suddenly and loudly turns on behind Diane and Steven
